rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Missouri has detected its first human case of bird flu in a patient who had no known contact with an infected animal, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) said on Friday.
